title: Simulation Game-Based Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computation skills and experience interpreting job-related data

learning_goals: Enhance mathematical modeling skills by converting real-life problems into simulation game formats
Apply data analysis techniques in complex decision-making processes through team-based game activities
